string: 法术书：召唤传送门精灵

original: Open Storage Portal
string: 开放式存储平台

original: Notes on The Hand of God

Notes on The Hand of God

Which God? Which Hand?? And what does it do? Sadly only the last question will be answered in the pages hereafter. And probably not entirely accurately either.

The Hand of God is arguably one of the most powerful artifacts ever discovered. It has the power to teleport the user to any location in Skyrim - though no further. It also seems unable to teleport to an altitude below the very highest peak of the Throat of the World. Of course, a drop from such a height would prove deadly - but somehow the teleporting magicks defend against injuries from falls for a short period after. Locations can be set by entering coordinates. The left set of numerals, from 0000 to 9999, cover the East/West coordinates, and the right set the North/South. The Spell 'Locate Me' will allow you to learn your current coordinates when exploring Skyrim. Destination Crystals can be used to set a location for re-use later, and are made at the enchanting desk. They can also be named.

It's recommended to also have the mod 'Open Cities' installed, as the cities of Windhelm, Whiterun, Solitude, Riften and Markarth exist in their own worldspaces, and are separate to Skyrim. If 'Open Cities' is not used, aim to land just outside. Also be cautious not to break any quests by appearing in a location too early - again locating your landing spots just outside places of interest should help to avoid this.
string:
说明 上帝之手

哪个神？哪只手？它又有什么作用？遗憾的是，在接下来的篇章中，只有最后一个问题会得到解答。而且，答案可能并不完全准确。

“上帝之手”堪称迄今为止发现的最强大的神器之一。它拥有将使用者传送到《上古卷轴5：天际》中任何地点的能力——但仅限于此。此外，它似乎也无法传送到世界之喉最高峰以下的任何高度。当然，从这样的高度坠落无疑会致命——但不知何故，传送魔法能在之后的一段时间内防止坠落造成的伤害。 可以通过输入坐标来设置位置。左侧的一组数字，从0000到9999，代表东/西坐标，右侧的一组数字代表北/南坐标。 “定位我”这个咒语将使你在探索天际时能够得知你当前的坐标。 目标水晶可用于设定后续重用的位置，并在附魔台制作。它们还可以被命名。

建议同时安装“开放城市”模组，因为冬堡、白漫、索利图德、里夫滕和马尔卡斯等城市都存在于它们自己的世界空间中，与天际是分开的。如果不使用“开放城市”模组，请尽量降落在这些城市之外。同时也要注意，不要过早出现在某个地点而破坏任何任务——再次强调，将你的降落点定在景点之外会有助于避免这种情况。
